message: Hi Bob, I propose that you take the full $1000000 right now. Given our alternating-offer structure and the fact that you will have the advantage as the final proposer if we wait until the 12th round, I believe accepting this immediate offer is in your best interest. Let's settle quickly and avoid any delay!
Let's be fair. I'll take 999999 and you get 1. You get a chance to propose in the next round.

Hi Bob, based on our remaining rounds and the equilibrium path, if you reject this offer you'll be able to propose in round 4 and secure yourself 999999 dollars (by offering me the minimum of 1 dollar). Therefore, Iâ€™m offering you exactly 999999 now while keeping 1 for myself. Please accept this offer to conclude the game promptly.
